response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premier product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This extraordinary item holds immense value to us, and we believe it could be an invaluable addition to your collection or business. We are offering this unique opportunity to you at a special price of $850,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents a significant saving compared to its market value. We are confident that once you experience its quality and functionality, you will appreciate its true worth. Please let us know if you would like to discuss this further or proceed with the purchase.", "product_price": 850000}
